sub_topic: Calculating the surface area of a cube.
message_1: A cube has a side length of 6 cm. What is the surface area of the cube in square centimeters?
message_2: A cube has 6 faces, and the surface area of each face is the square of the side length. So, the surface area of one face is 6 cm * 6 cm = 36 square centimeters. Since there are 6 faces, the total surface area of the cube is 6 * 36 = 216 square centimeters.
